channel.title: Custom interface help

item.title: Custom interface help
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

can somebody help me on how to add this:

public static void Assassin(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 intAssassin = AddTab(20000); intAssassin.anIntArray240 = new int[10]; intAssassin.anIntArray241 = new int[10]; intAssassin.anIntArray272 = new int[10]; //Main interface intAssassin.anIntArray240[0] = 20001; intAssassin.anIntArray241[0] = 4; intAssassin.anIntArray272[0] = 16; //No main interface image. //Control 1 of main interface (Image) intAssassin.anIntArray240[1] = 20002; intAssassin.anIntArray241[1] = 24; intAssassin.anIntArray272[1] = 36; AddInterfaceImage(20002, "Assassin", "back.png"); //Control 2 of main interface (Image) intAssassin.anIntArray240[2] = 20003; intAssassin.anIntArray241[2] = 61; intAssassin.anIntArray272[2] = 50; AddInterfaceImage(20003, "Assassin", "Wealth.png"); //Control 3 of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[3] = 20004; intAssassin.anIntArray241[3] = 36; intAssassin.anIntArray272[3] = 91; //Control 4B of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[4] = 20005; intAssassin.anIntArray241[4] = 59; intAssassin.anIntArray272[4] = 101; AddInterfaceLabel(20005, "Wealth", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(20004, 90, 41, "TextButton", "Assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 5 of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[5] = 20006; intAssassin.anIntArray241[5] = 203; intAssassin.anIntArray272[5] = 244; //Control 6B of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[6] = 20007; intAssassin.anIntArray241[6] = 226; intAssassin.anIntArray272[6] = 254; AddInterfaceLabel(20007, "Close", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(20006, 90, 41, "TextButton", "Assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); //Control 7 of main interface (Image) intAssassin.anIntArray240[7] = 20008; intAssassin.anIntArray241[7] = 173; intAssassin.anIntArray272[7] = 59; AddInterfaceImage(20008, "Assassin", "xp.png"); //Control 8 of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[8] = 20009; intAssassin.anIntArray241[8] = 151; intAssassin.anIntArray272[8] = 91; //Control 9B of main interface (TextButton) intAssassin.anIntArray240[9] = 20010; intAssassin.anIntArray241[9] = 186; intAssassin.anIntArray272[9] = 101; AddInterfaceLabel(20010, "XP", wid, 1, 0xFFA500); AddInterfaceButton(20009, 90, 41, "TextButton", "Assassin", "DefaultButton.png"); }
to a hybrid pvp client?
i also need help converting it, but if you could just tell me where i would add that i could probably convert it myself,
thanks
